title: Jeremy Corbyn's son brands actress Tracy Ann Oberman a 'nasty troll' after she mocks Labour leader
text:
Jeremy Corbyn's son has launched a furious attack on a prominent actress, branding her a "nasty troll" after she publicly criticised his father.

Tommy Corbyn, the youngest son of the Labour leader, has clashed with the former EastEnders actress Tracy Ann Oberman after she mocked Mr Corbyn in a series of social media posts.

Ms Oberman on Friday published images of Mr Corbyn attending the Park Theatre, north London, where she is currently performing in the production Mother of Him.

The 53-year-old actress, who is Jewish and an outspoken critic of Labour’s handling of anti-Semitism, posted pictures of Mr Corbyn attending the threatre with Baroness Chakrabarti, the shadow attorney general.

In...
description: Jeremy Corbyn's son has launched a furious attack on a prominent actress, branding her a "nasty troll" after she publicly criticised his father.
